channel.title: PLAXIS Informative Articles Feed
channel.description: Informing on the latest PLAXIS Informative Articles
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025, Seequent, the Bentley Subsurface Company

item.title: Asymmetric moment-axial force interaction for elastoplastic plates and embedded beams
item.description: This new feature in PLAXIS 2D 2024.2 allows to add interaction diagrams for axial force and bending moment.

item.title: Finite element modelling of a tailings dam using the Clay and Sand Model
item.description: Read this paper by A. Laera et al. about the new Clay and Sand Model in PLAXIS to capture flow liquefaction

item.title: Practicle Example: 3D Analysis of a Composite Support System for a Horse-shoe Shaped Tunnel
item.description: A practical example using PLAXIS 3D for a D-shaped hydro tunnel

item.title: Practical Example: Tunnel support analysis for a 250 m-deep tunnel in weak rock
item.description: This articles shows a practical application using PLAXIS for the calculation of the tunnel deformation and the effectiveness of the proposed tunnel support. It has been inspired by an article from Hoek (1998).
